name: Nothing to make a Fuss about
name_original: Nothing to make a Fuss about
description:
Play as Fuss, a transfeminine elf rogue looking to spend a relaxing evening at their Adventurers' Guild's tavern. Through three acts, choose how and with who Fuss will spend their night. Learn more about the world, Fuss themself, or their companions depending on your choices. Unlock more scenes and replay the game to explore new opportunities.

Thumbnail photo by Nikolay Osmachko from Pexels
